com.google.common.css

Class SourceCodeLocationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.css.SourceCodeLocationBuilder

  • public class SourceCodeLocationBuilder
extends Object
    Aids in the creation of source code locations. A builder can be used for creating a single SourceCodeLocation.
